backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with comments explaining domain configuration via VITE_PUBLIC_SITE_URL.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping domain‑config tasks to related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style list summarizing key frontend files and their roles in styling, SEO, config, and UI components.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment file documenting VITE_PUBLIC_SITE_URL format and fallback behavior.
frontend/DOMAIN_CONFIGURATION.md: Guide explaining how to set VITE_PUBLIC_SITE_URL with step‑by‑step configuration instructions and verification steps.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining color tokens, dark mode variants, and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: App entry HTML with script that normalizes VITE_PUBLIC_SITE_URL and generates canonical and og:url tags.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main SPA layout combining Header, Hero, Services, About, and Footer sections.
frontend/src/components/marketing/AboutS: About section with animated reveals, company intro, image, and value list.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Footer: Footer with company info, quick links, contact details, animations, and hostname-based UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Header: Responsive header with scroll detection, smooth section navigation, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/marketing/HeroSe: Landing hero with animated text, background image overlays, CTA buttons, and stat highlights.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Sectio: Wrapper component that animates children into view once using an intersection observer.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Servic: Services grid section displaying service cards with icons and reveal animations on scroll.
frontend/src/config/siteUrl.ts: Utility functions for resolving the public site origin and building absolute URLs using an optional env variable.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useInViewOnce.ts: Hook that uses an IntersectionObserver to mark an element as in-view once and trigger animations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables, base typography, animations, and accessibility/transition utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature lists, and pending requests for domain‑configuration work.
